metamodel.description:
Check this to generate class models on leading frameworks.
This Class Metamodel allows to model Application Object structure and persistence.
S-IDE provides the modeler to graphically produce class models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR500 Class

technology.description:
Check this to generate your class models on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution.
S-IDE allows to optimize the configuration of the Alfresco content model, views, forms and reports.
technology.name: Alfresco

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate class models on the major release 3 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.x is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution.
Additionally to content generation, S-IDE provides useful server components to enhance some features of this release.

generatorVersion.description:
Check this to generate a full deployable Alfresco Share package containing the newly designed content model and other Alfresco artefacts.
S-IDE provides the necessary components to deploy these packages through the 'deployer' tab.

configurationParameter.documentation: if not fill the package version number is "1.0"
configurationParameter.label: Package version

option.documentation: add custom alfresco share configuration to manage all meta datas in forms
option.label: defaultForms
